shows.title: The Rising with Martyn Joseph
shows.desc: Festival favourite and troubadour Martyn Joseph gathers together some of the best singer-songwriters at the festival, digging into their creative mindset and craft. Collaborations, informal jamming and rare candour from great Greenbelt artists.

shows.title: Josh Okeefe
shows.desc: In 2012, English folk-singer Josh Okeefe dropped out of school, travelled across the Atlantic and arrived in Nashville, Tennessee, in search of the places his idols Hank Williams and Johnny Cash once graced. Fast forward a few short years: Josh has performed with roots luminaries like Alison Krauss and had songs recorded by major label artists like Ashley Monroe.
